    Home

    Hello, I am Rafael Serrano-Quintero, a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Economic Theory at the University of Barcelona.

    I got my PhD from the Department of Economics (FAE) at the University of Alicante in 2021.

    My research interests are macroeconomics, economic growth, development, and structural change. I am also working on spatial models of economic development.
